entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: A nickname for Voldemort, used to refer to him without directly mentioning his name.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's, mentioned as having previously said something about Voldemort's soul.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned that You-Know-Who might be after something else to turn into a Horcrux.
Hermione's previous statement about Voldemort's soul has influenced Harry's thoughts and opinions.
